reviews.text: This is a delicious smooth and creamy butterscotch treat.   I didn't think it was much to write home about.  And then I changed the cotton and put in a fresh build and then the mls began to disappear into my lungs rather quickly.   5 stars for sure.  But I gotta hold furious to a much stricter standard and not pass out a cheap 5 star ratings.    Yup furious your recipes will be rated in comparison to your body of work displayed on this site.  Your mixing with a handicap now
